amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Motion by Senator Reid to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 4627 was not invoked (Record Vote Number 115) made in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 4627 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 42. Record Vote Number: 115.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 4627 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 4627 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S3581) In the nature of a substitute.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 4627 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 42. Record Vote Number: 115.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4627 proposed by Senator Rockefeller.
